name: Massive
description: "Massive" is a stylized feast of frantic and action shooter for 1-4 players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2.9 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 120 MB available space

reviews.review_text: good if you're too poor for nuclear throne, but It's actually a good game and really fun they release updates quite frequently.
